description: Defines the User class as an entity representing application users, including fields for email, display name, active status, creation timestamp, wishlists, and notification preferences, along with constructors and accessor methods.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents an application user with personal information and associations to wishlists and notification preferences.

methods.name: User
methods.description: Constructor to create a new User with email and display name, initializing notification preferences.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns whether the user is active.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the user.

methods.name: getWishlists
methods.description: Returns the set of wishlists associated with the user.
